title: Person of Interest - Comic-Con 2013 - Person of Interest - Cast Interview
author: CBS
comment: Wow, Amy is so kind and generous to her co-stars. Not that it isn't true, it's just how she gushes over saying it.  And yes, it was a great pleasure and privilege to see Amy and Michael work together, they were both amazing.  And to see how shy she is, how she seems a bit nervous, looking down, it's too endearing.
Fiction so much reality... very real now days!
finally i can see bit big smile on my hero reesee..love u all guys
John is still half-whispering. (aka Jim whatever)
description: Catch up with the cast members of Person of Interest. Don't miss the season premiere of Person of Interest, Tuesday, September 24th 10/9c. Only CBS!
